1�Use the device?Yes.No.
1�Attuning yourself to this runic portal will open a path to the Chamber of Passage.
1�Use the device?Yes.No.
e.�  has attuned ?[himself/herself] to the runic portal, and opened a path from the Nyzul Isle staging point to the Chamber of Passag
1�Use the device?Yes.No.
1�Attuning yourself to this runic portal will open a path to the Chamber of Passage.
1�Use the device?Yes.No.
e.�  has attuned ?[himself/herself] to the runic portal, and opened a path from the Nyzul Isle staging point to the Chamber of Passag
1�Hey, now!This is an ancient ruin you have the privilege to be in. Try not to disturb the--
1�But if you keep up that ruckus, who knows what sort of unwanted attention you'll attract?
1�Even with us here to protect you, some monster might snatch you away into the shadows.
1�They've even employed mercenaries from Salaheem's Sentinels to patrol the ruins for dangerous beasts.
1�Many alchemists have fallen prey to the legions of foul creatures that stalk these halls.
1�You know how on moonless nights you can hear the roar of the Cyan Deep echoing through the darkness?
1�That sound is really the wails of those lost alchemists as their spirits roam the ruins in despair...
1�Rishfee!
1�That's quite enough. The poor child is shaking in fear.
1�It is too late for him...
1�Letting the San d'Orian spy live was the right move, it seems...
1�Which part of the ruins do you ask about?The windows.The pillars.The floor.
1�Magus armor does not enhance the magic of a blue mage.
1�It brings you to the edge of the beast, and unshackles the power you are subconsciously repressing.
1�Its one other property...
1�...is to suppress the physical ??transformation?? of the vessel.
1�But do not rely on it to save you.Transformation is the fate of those who drown themselves in blue magic, and fail to control the power raging within.
1�They lose the ability to maintain their form, and the mortal vessel is destroyed...
1�What you have just witnessed could very possibly happen to any one of us.
1�You seem perplexed.This is the way of the blue mage--the path you have chosen.
1�You cannot undo your choice.
1�Your evolution cannot be stopped.
1�There is no going back.
1�But do not forget: our desire is also our strength.
1�Hunt down the beast and gorge your fill!
1�Seize the power to forge your own destiny!
d!�The vessel changes shape to meet its needs. Call it evolution.
1�But those who completely lose their mortal form are no better than monsters...
d?�Heh...
1�No matter. You have faced the truth and taken the life of a colleague you never knew.
1�Your actions do you credit.
1�Now, perhaps, you will understand Raubahn...or should I say, Waoud?
1�Now you may understand the meaning behind his questions...
1�I came to speak with you, Razfahd.
1�  is here as my friend.
1�I want you to stop using this automaton as a weapon of war.
1�This is true...but that was before I learned more about your intentions from   and Luzaf.
1�If you use this machine to summon the spirit of Alexander, the world will be plunged into Ragnarok!
1�In the space of a single night, the Empire will be reduced to a smoking ruin, just like the Alzadaal civilization before us...
1�Razfahd!Do you truly believe you can impose your will on a god!?
1�And even if you could, the ??peace?? such a god would grant us is nothing more than a farce.
1�Our nations are formed from a gathering of individuals.
1�It's when these nations learn to cooperate and live in harmony that we learn the true value of peace.
1�The gods bless us when they recognize the efforts we have made.
1�Please, Razfahd!I know that even   here would be willing to speak on our behalf.
1�We must try to negotiate with the Middle Lands once more!
1�But we can--!
.!�Listen to me,  .
1�I have failed to persuade my brother to change his course.
1�But we cannot allow this colossus to unleash another Divine Spear.
1�(Can you see that control box that Ghatsad labors over? I have seen it before.)
1�(It's much like one of the animators used to control a normal automaton.)
1�(If we can somehow gain access to that box, we should be able to operate the colossus from the outside.)
1�(All I need you to do is distract them for a moment!)
1�Has...has it stopped...?
1�Ovjang!?
1�Ovjang. Mnejing.Thank you...
1�Luzaf?What happened to me...?
1�Luzaf!
1�Don't you leave me as well!I will follow you anywhere...
g.�I will be the Empress that Aht Urhgan needs!
1�We have neglected our duties for far too long...
1�Aht Urhgan is waiting!
1�Thank goodness you've arrived.
1�This building--and those like it scattered throughout the land--are historic ruins of the great Alzadaal Dynasty, which flourished over 900 years ago.
1�Only under the most special of circumstances are those not from our lands permitted entry.
1�I'm afraid I cannot explain more at present, but this edifice is related to the prime avatar spoken of in Aht Urhganian legends.
1�In simple terms...an iron giant.
1�Its name is Alexander--a being that commands the forces light.
1�Forbidden...?
1�But that would call forth �[/ another] Ragnarok!
1� �[No!/You can't--!]
1�Shhh. You'll be in safe hands back at the palace.
1�Thank goodness you've arrived.
1�This building--and those like it scattered throughout the land--are historic ruins of the great Alzadaal Dynasty, which flourished over 900 years ago.
1�Only under the most special of circumstances are those not from our lands permitted entry.
1�We refer to it as the colossus, a grand device manufactured by the Empire that houses the prime avatar.
1�It's a being that rules over the forces of light...known as Alexander.
1�Forbidden...?
1�...Then let us begin.
1�You did it! You truly did it!That's my number one mercenary!
1�Brother!!! Brother, can you hear me?
1�...Then let us begin.
1�You did it! You truly did it!That's my number one mercenary!
1�Our people need live in fear of the colossus no more.Thank you,  . I knew you wouldn't fail us.
1�We will make arrangements with President Naja upon our return to the palace.Rest assured that you shall be richly rewarded for your efforts.
1� . You are a true ally of the Empire, and a true friend.Until we meet again...be well.
!�Now we have to get my brother out of there...
1�Luzaf!?
1�You're okay!Thank Walahra...
1�Look!We shut down the colossus!And Alexander is gone...
1�There's no one left to fight.There's no need for Odin to take you over...
!!�Where am I...?
1�Razfahd...?
1�What are you talking about?Your voice is so weak, Razfahd...
1�So...they have come.
1�This would explain the appearance of the cluster of dots on the control panel display, wouldn't it, Ghatsad?
1�Can we handle them all?
1�Very well.Let us await the arrival of this armada and provide Alexander with a fitting tribute.
..�You're just in time for the fireworks, Nashmeira.
1�Speak with me...?I see you've brought your pet mercenary along for the ??conversation.??
1�As you wish.Now what is it you wish to discuss?
1�Hmph, I should have known...
1�Nashmeira, you looked forward to the completion of the colossus as much as anyone.
1�Ragnarok? You disappoint me, Nashmeira.The servants of the underworld have poisoned your mind.
1�The might of Alexander will flood Urhguum with divine illumination, and bring about an eternal peace for the Empire.
1�This will be the true Age of Judgment.Ragnarok was merely an example of how our ancestors failed.
1�This time, there is nothing to fear.
1�The astral candescences that form the heart of this colossus have been created using the latest Imperial technology. We will not repeat the mistakes of Alzadaal.
1�Ever the idealist, Little Sister...
1�Do you not see how our Empire is suffering?
1�The authority we once wielded has all but evaporated.Our enemies constantly test our defenses, sniffing for the slightest hint of weakness like a tiger stalking a wounded marid...
1�Our citizens stand on the brink of oblivion.
1�And you must learn to accept certain sacrifices in exchange for their salvation.
1�It is far too late for that.
1�A fleet of airships from your precious Middle Lands approaches even as we speak.
1�If we do nothing, Al Zahbi will be engulfed in a sea of flame...Who knows how many of our people will die?
1�The cogs of war have begun to turn, and there is nothing either you or I can do to stop them.
1�Nashmeira.
1�I am resolved to be remembered as the villain in this chapter of history. You need not let it concern you.
1�But I will tolerate no further hindrances.
g.�Raubahn.
1�(Nashmeira...)
1�Do not fear...
1�I will not...allow...these deities...to destroy our beloved...Aht Urhgan...
1�I wanted to see...your smiling face...one more time...
1�Yes, Grand Vizier.They appear to be moving slowly, and keeping some distance from each other. They obviously fear the destructive power of the main cannon.

1�We focused the energy of the cannon when destroying the previous target, but perhaps this time we should lure the enemy vessels as close as possible and then fire in a diffusion pattern. There's a good chance the entire fleet will be obliterated...
1�In any case, we need to wait for the cannon to recharge.
1�Is this the dawn of Ragnarok...!?
!?�Amnaf.My dear Immortal Lion.
1�Your part in this is over.You have earned eternal rest...
w!� ...one day I shall feast on your soul...
..�So,  ...This is the path you have chosen?
..�We have received an update from a patrol boat in the Gugru Blue.A force of close to fifty airships has been sighted advancing on Aht Urhgan.
1�Silence.It begins.
1�L...Lord Razfahd!?
1�Silence.It begins.
1�It has all unfolded just as the Grand Vizier predicted.
1�And so you have come...
1�A pity.I always respected you,  , but such are the twists of fate.
1�Naja! What is the meaning of this?
1�You worry for a few measly coins?If you stand against me, your entire company is at stake.
1�Times have changed, foolish Mithra...
1�<Wheeze>...
1�I will...not...allow...
..�I...will...stop...you...
1�For...my...Raz...fahd...<wheeze>...
!?�Hehehe.

1�One, two, three...at 
 	)???????? per...

1� !This level of assistance just cost ya 
 	)????????!
1�That's what I'd like to know!
1�This employee still has a pile of tuition fees to pay.If I let ?[him/her] come to a messy end here, I'm losin' out on a lot of cash!
1�Ooh, I'm shakin' in my booties.Need I rrremind ya that my company has the personal backing of the Emprrress?
1�My help is expensive,  .Better take care of this quickly if ya don't wanna spend the rrrest of your life payin' it off!
1�Ewww...Now this is an interrrestin' development.
1�My tail is twitchin' all over the place...
1�(Listen up,  . We rrrun in different directions and meet up back at the office...)
1�Aphmau!
..�Aphmau!!!
.?�Aphmau...
1�There are yet many things for you to accomplish.
..�Great Odin, Lord of the Underworld!
1�I have defied your will!
1�And yet I live...
1�Why do you spare me?
1�I relinquish this pseudo-life of mine to the girl, Aphmau...
1�It is time I returned to serve you in the halls of Valhalla...
1�Aphmau?
1�Merciful Odin...
1�There is more I would say to you.
1�But my time here has drawn to an end...
1�You have a future before you.And it is not your future alone...
1�The citizens of the Empire and of Ephramad...You carry the burden of their hopes and dreams...
1�You are surrounded by those who care for you.The people of Aht Urhgan...the highest general to the lowest footsoldier in your army...And, of course, your trusted mercenary,  ...
